title: Karnataka: Violence in Hubballi over WhatsApp status, 40 people taken into custody - The Indian Express
content: Karnataka: Violence in Hubballi over WhatsApp status, 40 people taken into custody  The Indian ExpressView Full coverage on Google News
description: The police said that about 40 people have been taken into custody after the violence and Hubballi-Dharwad city police commissioner Labhu Ram said that prohibitory orders under Section 144 of the Code of Criminal Procedure (CrPC) have been imposed till 6 am on April 20.
